availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Marion Williamson (Peoria, Peoria County Illinois, lawyer and judge.)

body.p: Peoria County, Illinois, attorney and judge. Ohio native. Father of Sarah "Sally" Williamson. Married to Louisa Maxwell Williamson in Peoria County, Illinois, on February 21, 1860. Father of Marshall Williamson. Attorney in Peoria County, Illinois, in 1860. Jude of the Peoria Circuit Court from 1863 to 1867.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Peoria County, Peoria Ward 3, p. 225.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Peoria County, Peoria Ward 3, p. 349A.
Illinois, U.S., County Marriage Records, 1800-1940, Peoria County Marriages, Peoria County Courthouse, Peoria, IL, Marriage Register, 1859-1867.
The History of Peoria County, Illinois (Chicago: Johnson & Company, 1880), 338-9.
